contentrichtext.text: [[File:ボンカレーホーロー看板A217583.jpg|thumb|150px|Yoko Matsuyama in a curry advertisement]] {{nihongo|'''Yōko Matsuyama'''|松山 容子|Matsuyama Yōko|born 30 November 1937 in [[Matsuyama, Ehime]],<ref>http://www.yajyu.com/cinema/cinen13.htm</ref> [[Japan]]}} is a Japanese [[actress]] best known for her work in the ''[[Crimson Bat]]'' series. ==Filmography== #''[[Crimson Bat]]'' (紅蝙蝠; ''Kurenai Kawahori'') (1958) #明治の風雪　柔旋風 (''Meiji fuusetsu: Yawara sempuu'')(1965) #続・柔旋風　四天王誕生 (''Tsuzuki yawara sempuu: Shitennou tanjyou''?) (1965) #''Crimson Bat: The Blind Swordsman'' (めくらのお市物語　真っ赤な流れ鳥; ''Mekura no oichi monogatari: Makkana nagaradori'') (1969) #''Trapped, the Crimson Bat'' (めくらのお市　地獄肌; ''Mekurano Oichi jigokuhada'') (1969) #''Watch Out, Crimson Bat!'' (めくらのお市　みだれ笠; ''Mekurano Oichi midaregasa'') (1969) #''Crimson Bat - Oichi: Wanted, Dead or Alive'' (めくらのお市　命貰います; ''Mekurano Oichi inochi moraimasu'') (1970) ==See also== *[[Japanese curry|Bon curry]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *{{imdb name|id=0559694|name=Yoko Matsuyama}} *{{jmdb name|id=0186050|name=Yoko Matsuyama}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Matsuyama Yoko | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = 30 November 1937 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Matsuyama Yoko}} [[Category:1937 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Japanese actresses]] [[Category:People from Matsuyama, Ehime]] {{Japan-actor-stub}}
